this_title: Peepoodo & the Super Fuck Friends Season 1
trans_title: 屁破多和他的坑爹伙伴们 第一季
introduction: Peepoodo & the Super Fuck Friends is a French animated series by Balak (co-creator of Les Kassos and Last Man) for the Blackpills app that parodies children's programmes in a hilariously NSFW way. Its main cast are Funny Animal characters who constantly have their junk hanging out, and every episode has another extremely sexual topic. You may need a shower after watching, that's for sure.The first season was first released July 16, 2018 in French, and spanned 18 episodes. The English dub was released May 2, 2019 on the official website, and plans for a possible second season have been discussed
